vote.title: A public hearing to receive comments on the adoption of Reprogramming Budget No. 1 (Substantial Amendment No. 3) to the FY 2021-22 Action Plan to: (a) use unspent prior year CDBG Funds in the amount of $2,569,591 for the Residential Development Acquisition Loan Program and (b) use unspent CDBG CARES Act Relief Fund No. 3 (CDBG-COVID) Funds in the amount of $250,000 in the Digital Navigators Program for the Eviction Assistance Initiative; and, at the close of the public hearing, authorize final adoption of Reprogramming Budget No. 1 (Substantial Amendment No. 3) to the FY 2021-22 Action Plan - Financing: This action has no cost consideration to the City (see Fiscal Information)
vote.description: A public hearing to receive comments on the adoption of Reprogramming Budget No. 1 (Substantial Amendment No. 3) to the FY 2021-22 Action Plan to: (a) use unspent prior year CDBG Funds in the amount of $2,569,591 for the Residential Development Acquisition Loan Program and (b) use unspent CDBG CARES Act Relief Fund No. 3 (CDBG-COVID) Funds in the amount of $250,000 in the Digital Navigators Program for the Eviction Assistance Initiative; and, at the close of the public hearing, authorize final adoption of Reprogramming Budget No. 1 (Substantial Amendment No. 3) to the FY 2021-22 Action Plan - Financing: This action has no cost consideration to the City (see Fiscal Information)
